original_text: Therefore, since we are surrounded by so great a cloud of witnesses, let us also lay aside every weight, and sin which clings so closely, and let us run with endurance the race that is set before us,
korean_text: 이러므로 우리에게 구름 같이 둘러싼 허다한 증인들이 있으니 모든 무거운 것과 얽매이기 쉬운 죄를 벗어 버리고 인내로써 우리 앞에 당한 경주를 하며

sentences.original_text: since we are surrounded by so great a cloud of witnesses,
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 이렇게 큰 구름 같이 둘러싸인 증인들이 있으니,

sentences.original_text: let us also lay aside every weight,
and sin which clings so closely,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 우리에게 꼭 달라붙는 죄를 벗고,

sentences.original_text: and let us run with endurance the race that is set before us,
sentences.korean_translation: 우리 앞에 놓인 경주를 인내로 달리자,
